  BIC: Blot: Blot be maaaad! No fightsing!

    ----- Original Message ----=

    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday=
, May 08, 2001 9:48 PM
    Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/G=
alactor Jets


    ::Cutthroat::

          Cutthroat, being a copycat, and=
 not wanting to lose an advantage, also transformed to robot mode.  He stoo=
d still, and the 4 shits hit him in the chest.  He looked a little dumbfoun=
ded for a moment, then whipped out his gun and shot 4 shots back at Hun-Grr=
.

    OOC: Ok, I just said gun 'cause I don't know what weapons Cutthroat =
has in robot mode.
